item.description:
Join us for a voyage on the seas of cheese that you will be unlikely to forget. Witness a piece of Brattle theater history as they endeavor to kick off a series of yearly Schlock around the clock marathons. This event will probably feature it features a dash of Ed Wood, a whif of midget western, a smidge of 80s horror, and a healthy dose of misguided pop star vanity projects.

The plan is to meet at a Cambridge eatery (and yes, suggestions will be taken) to fortify ourselves for this long, strange trip. No one is expected to stay the whole time (9:30 pm to 12:30 pm on 2/18), but there will be some interesting highlights including:

- A smalltown tramp - http://imdb.com/title...
- A horrible horror movie circa 1990 - http://imdb.com/title...
- The 1975 Pilot for the New Original Wonder Woman - http://imdb.com/title...
- A sci-fi remake of Casablanca starring Pamela Anderson Lee - http://imdb.com/title... (yes you read that right)
- An 80s teen sex comedy - http://imdb.com/title...
- A homicidal Elvis impersonator - http://imdb.com/title...
- A misguided children's film - http://imdb.com/title...
- Ed Wood's Bride of the Monster - http://imdb.com/title...
- A midget western - http://imdb.com/title...

This event will be hosted by Nicole, your friendly meetup assistant organizer.
item.name: Schlockfest 2007
